    • Constructor Detail

      • CarPolicy

        public CarPolicy(java.lang.String aPolicyNo,
                 int aYearOfIssue,
                 double aCarValue,
                 int aDriverAge,
                 int aNoClaimYears,
                 boolean afullyComprehensive)
          throws IllegalPolicyException
        constructing a new instance for a car policy
        Parameters:
        aPolicyNo - a policy no. to be given to the new policy
        aYearOfIssue - a year of issue to be given to the new policy
        aCarValue - the value of the car to be insured
        aDriverAge - the age of the driver to be insured
        aNoClaimYears - the number of years the driver didn't have a claim
        afullyComprehensive - stating if the policy is fully comprehensive
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - if the driver's age is not between 17 and 99
